title: State Of Mind 1.1 – A futuristic thriller game delving into transhumanism

title: Memoranda 1.1 – 2D point and click adventure game
content: Memoranda is a game about forgetting and being forgotten!   A point and click adventure game with magic realism elements that tells the story of a young lady who gradually realizes she is forgetting her own name.
